messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content:
- Standing up for our NHS
- Streets safe from crime
- Affordable homes for all
- Investing in a green future
- Ending the Tory Brexit chaos

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reverse Tory cuts and support police and community workers.
Radically change course to prevent irreversible damage to the planet and tackle carbon emissions.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing in health and social care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide more doctors and nurses, reduce hospital waiting times, and fund the new health center.
Give the option to remain in the EU to end the chaos caused by Brexit.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Under the Tories, Nottinghamshire Police has lost 473 police officers

issues.brexitEurope: I'm as frustrated as you that Parliament has spent so much time arguing about Brexit instead of fixing the problems in our country.
issues.environment: Confronting the climate emergency, we have to tackle the irreversible damage to our planet.
issues.government: As your MP, I'll continue fighting for our communities and supporting practical action locally on things like cleaner air, better housing and transport.
issues.health: Providing more doctors and nurses, reducing hospital waiting times, funding the new health center in the Meadows.
issues.lawCrime: Safer streets from crime, reversing Tory cuts to our police and community services.

community.content: Standing up for our NHS, safer streets, affordable homes, investing in a green future, ending the Tory Brexit chaos.

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been an honour to represent Nottingham South over the last nine years and I'm standing on my record as a community-focused MP who gets things done.

endorsements.endorsement: "Our children's school has faced huge budget cuts under this Government. We need an MP like Lilian because she works so hard to secure the investment our schools need."
"I'll be voting for Lilian on 12 December because she has always been there for me and my family when we've needed help and support. I know she will always stand up for our community."

quotes.text: "It has been an honour to represent Nottingham South over the last nine years and I'm standing on my record as a community-focused MP who gets things done."

"I'm as frustrated as you that Parliament has spent so much time arguing about Brexit instead of fixing the problems in our country. Only Labour will give you the final say with the option to remain."

examples: Under the Tories, Nottinghamshire Police has lost 473 police officers and 91 PCSOs.
Reverse Tory cuts to our police and community services.

As your MP, I'll continue fighting for our communities and supporting practical action locally on things like cleaner air, better housing and transport.

personalStories.story: "Our children's school has faced huge budget cuts under this Government. We need an MP like Lilian because she works so hard to secure the investment our schools need."
"I'll be voting for Lilian on 12 December because she has always been there for me and my family when we've needed help and support. I know she will always stand up for our community."

examples: Chris and Emilie Daniel, Wollaton: "Our children's school has faced huge budget cuts under this Government. We need an MP like Lilian because she works so hard to secure the investment our schools need."

Shaheen Munir, Leen Valley: "I'll be voting for Lilian on 12 December because she has always been there for me and my family when we've needed help and support. I know she will always stand up for our community."
Reversing Tory cuts to our police and community services.
Reverse Tory cuts to our police and community services.
As your MP, I'll continue fighting for our communities and supporting practical action locally on things like cleaner air, better housing and transport.

"I'm as frustrated as you that Parliament has spent so much time arguing about Brexit instead of fixing the problems in our country. Only Labour will give you the final say with the option to remain."
Under the Tories, Nottinghamshire Police has lost 473 police officers and 91 PCSOs.
I've represented Nottingham South over the last nine years.
